about_the_game:
The complete soundtrack to Galactic Delivery (with bonus track)

MP3 format
44100hz sample rate
320kbps bitrate
Stereo

Total size: 158 mb
Soundtrack length: 1 hour, 8 minutes

Tracklist

1. Sunrise In Space 02:41
2. New Galaxies 04:14
3. Fading Constellations 05:54
4. Floating 04:48
5. The Lost Children 04:53
6. The Traveler's Eyes 03:50
7. Light On The Horizon 05:43
8. Space Island 03:19
9. Approaching Karnen 06:54
10. Loss (Somewhere In Time) 03:22
11. Almost There 04:29
12. Something New 05:10
13. Before The End 04:30
14. The Last Star 04:48
15. Quasar (Bonus Track) 03:52


Analog: Roland Juno-60, Roland Juno-106, Korg PolySix, Roland Jupiter-4, Roland Jupiter-8, Yamaha CS-80.

Softsynths: Rob Papen Predator, Synapse The Legend, Synapse Antidote, Reveal Sound Spire, Aurora Hybrid Synthesizer, TAL-U-NO-LX, Synth 1, Propellerhead: Europa, Subtractor, Thor, Grain. Roland: System-8, Jupiter-8, JUNO-106.
